data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 417,300 people living in Cork.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cork, Ireland
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Cork, Ireland to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Cork to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Cork, Ireland that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Cork, Ireland to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Cork to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 6,487 believers in Cork, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cork, Ireland has a population of 417,300.

We estimate Cork has 6,487 people who might know Jesus, 374,951 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 35,862 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 64 neighbors who need Jesus.
